item.title: KSIIDC Chairman Reviews Progress of Raichur Airport Project
item.description:
<![CDATA[Speaking to reporters after the inspection, he stated that around 31 per cent of the construction work has been completed so far."Raichur airport is being developed over a total area of 322 acres. The runway work is expected to be completed within the next two-and-a-half months. Our target is to complete the entire project within the next one-and-a-half years,” he said.
On rehabilitation measures, he said that three acres of land have been earmarked in Eganur village to relocate 30 houses affec...]]>
item.author: Gururaj A Paniyadi, About The Author, Principal Correspondent With Deccan Chronicle, Specializes In Covering Coastal, North Karnataka Districts. His Expertise Lies In Political Analysis, He Holds A Profound Interest In Human Interest Stories, History, Culture. Offering Extensive Coverage, Gururaj Explores Various Facets, Including Politics

item.title: NH-167 widening: Cabinet clears Rs 3,175 crore Telangana stretch
item.description:
<![CDATA[Centre approves widening of NH-167 connecting Mahabubnagar and Raichur in Telangana
This will help to smooth movement of traffic between Mahabubnagar in Telangana and Raichur in Karnataka....]]>

item.title: Raichur Zilla Panchayat clears contractor’s dues after court orders seizure of CEO’s car
item.description:
<![CDATA[No confusion in BJP-JD(S) alliance: Kumaraswamy 14-02-2026 ¦ 14-02-2026 IST
14-02-2026 ¦ 14-02-2026 IST
Bengaluru (PTI): Union Minister H D Kumaraswamy on Saturday dismissed speculation over confusion in the BJP-JD(S) alliance, asserting that there was clarity within them and that discussions on the chief minister post were premature.
Addressing reporters at the party's state office, JP Bhavan, after chairing a preparatory meeting for the Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA) elections, he sa...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
